episodes.title: How I Accidentally Joined a Cult
episodes.description:
“Guys… I think we were in a cult.”

Rachel Evangeline Chiong thought she was just going to a Christian homeschool conference in Indianapolis. New clothes, a road trip, a little light Bible study… it was all pretty standard. Until, years later, her sister sent her a text.

Rachel tells the story of how a childhood curriculum called the Wisdom Booklets led to a trip into a very conservative Christian organization, complete with khaki skirts, strict dress codes, and something called “umbrellas of authority.”

👉 Ever realized something strange way after the fact? Hit that like button.
👉 Got a wild homeschool story of your own? Drop it in the comments.
👉 Subscribe for more stories that are too weird to be made up.
